title: Silent Hill 1 (PC).zip
description:
This is the great SILENT HILL 1 for PC!

It's a "must have" for true fans!

Just unzip the downloaded file and run autorun.exe to install the game.

Silent Hill should run fine on most systems.


As you know, the first Silent Hill was not officially released for PC. So this version is based on PlayStation-CD image and a PS-emulator. Glitches and crashes could be fixed by manually configuring the emulator (i.e. you should go to the folder you installed SH into, run epsxe.exe from there, re-configure video/sound etc. and run .iso file from the File menu of ePSXe).

If you have problems downloading/installing/configuring/running - please write comments here. I'll try to help you.
